channel.title: Royal Blood broken to Princess to Assassin
channel.description:
#### I was Prince who turned into a Duchess. Then I became an Assassin. The King died. I was suppose to have Royal Blood and step up there. But I couldn't step up there, then the Prince step up there. (Let's not speak about that)
#### I was suppose to keep my royal blood when I was Princess to Assassin. So I should be able to step up as King before it gets pass down to anyone.
#### Be a Princess. Be converted N2. The Assassin dies D3 by execution. N4 as an Assassin. D4 nothing happened. N5 Kills someone. D6: King is died, anyone can step up as King.
#### Comments: This cost us the game as Unseen. We need to fix this or games with converted Royal blood will be ruin.

item.title: Royal Blood broken to Princess to Assassin
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
When you are converted and original assassin dies, you become new assassin.

You can’t keep Princess/Duchess abilities forever.

Read full topic
item.source: Royal Blood broken to Princess to Assassin

item.title: Royal Blood broken to Princess to Assassin
item.dc:creator: _PG_Felgurity
item.description:
I was Prince who turned into a Duchess. Then I became an Assassin. The King died. I was suppose to have Royal Blood and step up there. But I couldn’t step up there, then the Prince step up there. (Let’s not speak about that)

I was suppose to keep my royal blood when I was Princess to Assassin. So I should be able to step up as King before it gets pass down to anyone.

Be a Princess. Be converted N2. The Assassin dies D3 by execution. N4 as an Assassin. D4 nothing happened. N5 Kills someone. D6: King is died, anyone can step up as King.

Comments: This cost us the game as Unseen. We need to fix this or games with converted Royal blood will be ruin.

Read full topic
item.source: Royal Blood broken to Princess to Assassin
